6.name: wordpress/news-announcement-scroll
6.description:
Check official website for Live demo and Video tutorial http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/01/01/news-announcement-scroll/

  • Live Demo
  • Video tutorial
  • More Information
  • Download link

News announcement scroll wordpress plug-in create a vertical scroll news widget for your wordpress website, This is same as announcement and vertical scroll news wordpress plugin. announcement and vertical scroll news wordpress plugin disappeared suddenly from wordpress directory, so i have created the same plugin with different name. This is very easy to use, no coding knowledge
